para_sentences.para_0: Finding an optimal solution for the dynamic programming algorithm enables to solve all aspects of dynamic programming questions.
para_sentences.para_1: In question 1 you will use the dynamic programming technique to solve a problem, and you will find an optimal solution for the problem. (MLO1 & MLO2)
para_sentences.para_2: In question 2, you will solve a backtracking algorithm similar to the one that we looked in the exploration. (MLO3)

para_sentences.para_0: Download the assignment questions from this assignment file.
You will turn in the submission files via Canvas and Gradescope.
para_sentences.para_1: All your answers other than python code files will be turned in through thisCanvas assignment in a pdf file.
para_sentences.para_2: The python files to be submitted on Gradescope:

ol_0: Solve Dynamic Programming Problem and find its optimal solution
